solution_line_template: Shara collected {shells_per_day} x {num_days_initial} = <<{shells_per_day}*{num_days_initial}={shells_found_initial_days}>>{shells_found_initial_days} shells for {num_days_initial} days.
So she collected {shells_found_initial_days} + {shells_fourth_day} = <<{shells_found_initial_days}+{shells_fourth_day}={total_shells_vacation}>>{total_shells_vacation} shells rom her vacation.
Thus, she now has a total of {initial_shells} + {total_shells_vacation} = <<{initial_shells}+{total_shells_vacation}={total_shells_now}>>{total_shells_now} shells.
